nodes.text: A slaver was a person who bought, sold, or managed slaves. Darts D'Nar was a Zygerrian slaver who operated during the Clone Wars. Azmorigan was a Jablogian slaver who operated during the reign of the Galactic Empire.
Slavers prized the Wookiees of Kashyyyk due to the species' long lifespan, strength, and keen intellect. When Asajj Ventress was an infant, she was taken by a slaver.

During the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems restored the Zygerrian Slave Empire as a puppet state. With the backing of the Separatist Droid Army, the Zygerrians captured and enslaved the Togruta people of the Kiros colony. A rescue mission was launched, consisting of Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Ahsoka Tano, and clone trooper captain CT-7567 "Rex."
